AT.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
AT.description: In einer nicht allzufernen Zukunft sind die Staus auf den Straßen so schlimm, dass es nur noch einen Weg gibt, eine Pizza innerhalb von 30 Minuten ans andere Ende der Stadt zu liefern - schlecht bezahlte Teenage-Ninjas! Ninja Pizza Girl ist ein grandioser Plattformer, dessen Moral so tiefgründig ist wie eine reichhaltig belegte Pizza. Als traditioneller Action-Plattformer bietet er einen ausgefeilten Speedrun-Modus sowie Comic-Zwischensequenzen, handgezeichnet von einer echten Teenagerin. Die Handlung dreht sich um Gemma, ein 16-jähriges Mädchen, das in der unabhängigen Pizzeria ihres Vaters als Lieferninja arbeitet. In einer Welt, in der Slums auf den Dächern von Wolkenkratzern schwanken, in der mächtige Megakonzerne die Armen ausbeuten, und in der eine gute Pizza eine Seltenheit darstellt, muss Gemma gegen die gnadenlosesten Gegner kämpfen, die sich ein Teenager vorstellen kann, wenn sie ihre Ideale, ihre Familie und das Geschäft bewahren will - andere Teenager. Ninja Pizza Girl. Für die Familie. Für die Ehre. Für Pizza.

AU.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
AU.description: In the not too distant future, traffic is so bad there is only one way to deliver a pizza across town in 30 minutes or less - underpaid teenage ninjas! Ninja Pizza Girl is a supreme platformer with a deep-dish message. Featuring an old-school action platformer vibe, a dedicated speedrun mode, and comic cutscenes hand drawn by an authentic teenage girl. Its deeply-woven story follows Gemma, a sixteen-year-old girl working as a pizza delivery ninja for her father’s independent Pizzeria. In a world where slums teeter on top of skyscrapers, where powerful mega-corporations exploit the poor and where quality pizza is hard to come by, Gemma must fight to keep her ideals, her family and their business intact in face of the most merciless enemies known to any teenage girl – other teenagers. Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

BG.name: Ninja Pizza Girl

Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

BE.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
BE.description: Dans un futur pas si lointain, la circulation est tellement mauvaise qu'il n'existe qu'un seul moyen de livrer une pizza de l'autre côté de la ville en 30 minutes : des ninjas adolescents sous-payés ! Ninja Pizza Girl est un jeu de plateformes ultime avec un message à plat profond. Il inclut une atmosphère de jeu de plateformes et d'action rétro, un mode course contre la montre, des cinétiques de comics dessinées par une vraie ado. Son histoire complexe suit Gemma, une ado de seize ans qui travaille en tant que ninja livreuse de pizzas pour la pizzeria indépendante de son père. Dans un monde où les quartiers pauvres ricanent au sommet des gratte-ciel, où les mégacorporations au pouvoir infini exploitent les pauvres et où une bonne pizza est difficile à trouver, Gemma doit se battre pour conserver ses idéaux, sa famille et son entreprise intacts face aux ennemis les plus redoutables pour toute ado : les autres jeunes de son âge. Ninja Pizza Girl. Pour la famille. Pour l'honneur. Pour les pizzas.

ES.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
ES.description: En un futuro no muy lejano, el tráfico urbano es tan malo que sólo hay una manera de entregar una pizza al otro lado de la ciudad en 30 minutos o menos: ¡ninjas adolescentes mal pagados! Ninja Pizza Girl es un excelente juego de plataformas con un mensaje de masa gruesa. Muestra un ambiente de plataformas retro, un modo speedrun elaborado y graciosas escenas dibujadas a mano por una auténtica adolescente. La historia trata de Gemma, una chica de dieciséis años que trabaja como repartidora ninja en una pizzería independiente de su padre. En un mundo en el que los barrios bajos se ubican en lo alto de los rascacielos, en el que las poderosas multinacionales explotan a los pobres y en el que las pizzas de calidad son difíciles de conseguir, Gemma debe luchar por ser fiel a sus ideales y mantener a su familia y su negocio frente a los enemigos más implacables que cualquier adolescente haya conocido: otros adolescentes. Ninja Pizza Girl. Por la familia. Por la honra. Por la pizza.

Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

IT.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
IT.description: In un futuro non troppo lontano, il traffico è così intenso che esiste un solo modo per consegnare una pizza in città in meno di 30 minuti: giovani ninja sottopagati! Ninja Pizza Girl è un bellissimo gioco a piattaforme con un profondo messaggio. Con un'ambientazione da gioco d'azione a piattaforme della vecchia scuola, una modalità di speedrun dedicata e scene in stile fumetto disegnate a mano da una vera teenager. Il profondo intreccio della sua storia segue le gesta di Gemma, una sedicenne che lavora come porta pizze ninja nella pizzeria di suo padre. In un mondo dove le catapecchie oscillano sui tetti dei grattacieli, le potenti aziende sfruttano i poveri ed è difficile trovare una buona pizza, Gemma deve lottare per mantenere intatti i propri ideali, la sua famiglia e i suoi affari affrontando i più spietati nemici che un'adolescente possa incontrare: altri adolescenti. Ninja Pizza Girl. Per la famiglia. Per l'onore. Per la pizza.

Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

NL.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
NL.description: In de niet al te verre toekomst, is het verkeer zo slecht dat er maar één manier is, om binnen 30 minuten of minder, een pizza naar de andere kant van de stad te brengen - onderbetaalde tienerninja's! Ninja Pizza Girl is een geweldige platformer met een deep-dish boodschap. Met een old-school actie platformer vibe, een speciale Speedrun-modus, en komische tussenfilmpjes die met de hand getekend zijn door een authentiek tienermeisje. Het complexe verhaal volgt Gemma, een zestienjarig meisje dat werkt als een pizzakoerier ninja voor haar vaders Pizzeria. In een wereld waar sloppenwijken bovenop wolkenkrabbers te vinden zijn en waar de machtige mega-bedrijven de armen uitbuitten en waar kwaliteit pizza zeldzaam is, moet Gemma vechten om haar idealen, haar familie en hun bedrijf intact te houden in het aanzien van de meest meedogenloze vijanden die een tienermeisje kan hebben - andere tieners. Ninja Pizza Girl. Voor familie. Voor eer. Voor pizza.

NZ.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
NZ.description: In the not too distant future, traffic is so bad there is only one way to deliver a pizza across town in 30 minutes or less - underpaid teenage ninjas! Ninja Pizza Girl is a supreme platformer with a deep-dish message. Featuring an old-school action platformer vibe, a dedicated speedrun mode, and comic cutscenes hand drawn by an authentic teenage girl. Its deeply-woven story follows Gemma, a sixteen-year-old girl working as a pizza delivery ninja for her father’s independent Pizzeria. In a world where slums teeter on top of skyscrapers, where powerful mega-corporations exploit the poor and where quality pizza is hard to come by, Gemma must fight to keep her ideals, her family and their business intact in face of the most merciless enemies known to any teenage girl – other teenagers. Ninja Pizza Girl is a supreme platformer with a deep-dish message. In a world where slums teeter on top of skyscrapers, where powerful mega-corporations exploit the poor and where quality pizza is hard to come by, Gemma must fight to keep her ideals, her family and their business intact in face of the most merciless enemies known to any teenage girl – other teenagers. Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

PT.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
PT.description: Num futuro não muito distante, o trânsito será tão mau que só existirá uma maneira para entregar uma pizza no outro lado da cidade em 30 minutos ou menos: ninjas adolescentes mal pagos! Ninja Pizza Girl é um fantástico jogo de plataformas com uma mensagem de massa grossa. Contém a mesma vibração e ação dos jogos clássicos de plataforma, um modo dedicado de corrida veloz, e cenas cómicas desenhadas à mão por uma autêntica rapariga adolescente. A sua história intrincada segue Gemma, uma rapariga de dezasseis anos que trabalha como uma ninja distribuidora de pizzas para a Pizzaria independente do seu pai. Num mundo onde os bairros de lata se penduram no topo dos arranha-céus, onde poderosas mega-corporações exploram os mais pobres, e onde é difícil encontrar pizza de qualidade, Gemma deve lutar para manter os seus ideais, a sua família e o seu negócio intactos diante dos inimigos mais impiedosos de qualquer rapariga adolescente: outros adolescentes. Ninja Pizza Girl. Pela Família. Pela Honra. Pela Pizza.

RU.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
RU.description: В не очень далеком будущем пробки будут настолько велики, что доставлять пиццу через весь город за 30 минут или меньше смогут только низкооплачиваемые ниндзя-подростки! Ninja Pizza Girl — это отличный платформер с бескомпромиссной идеей. Игра включает энергетику традиционного экшн-платформера, выделенный режим скоростного прохождения игры и смешные заставки, от руки нарисованные настоящей художницей-подростком. Это запутанная история о 16-летней девочке Джемме, которая работает ниндзя-разносчицей пиццы в пиццерии своего отца. В мире, где трущобы качаются на вершинах небоскребов, где мощные мегакорпорации эксплуатируют бедных, и где качественную пиццу трудно найти, Джемма должна бороться, чтобы сохранить свои идеалы, свою семью и свой бизнес, против самых беспощадных врагов, известных любой девочке-подростку — других подростков. Ниндзя-разносчица пиццы. За семью. За честь. За пиццу.

SE.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
SE.description: In the not too distant future, traffic is so bad there is only one way to deliver a pizza across town in 30 minutes or less - underpaid teenage ninjas! Ninja Pizza Girl is a supreme platformer with a deep-dish message. Featuring an old-school action platformer vibe, a dedicated speedrun mode, and comic cutscenes hand drawn by an authentic teenage girl. Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.

RO.name: Ninja Pizza Girl
RO.description: In the not too distant future, traffic is so bad there is only one way to deliver a pizza across town in 30 minutes or less - underpaid teenage ninjas! Ninja Pizza Girl is a supreme platformer with a deep-dish message. Featuring an old-school action platformer vibe, a dedicated speedrun mode, and comic cutscenes hand drawn by an authentic teenage girl. Its deeply-woven story follows Gemma, a sixteen-year-old girl working as a pizza delivery ninja for her father’s independent Pizzeria. In a world where slums teeter on top of skyscrapers, where powerful mega-corporations exploit the poor and where quality pizza is hard to come by, Gemma must fight to keep her ideals, her family and their business intact in face of the most merciless enemies known to any teenage girl – other teenagers. Ninja Pizza Girl. For Family. For Honour. For Pizza.
